name: Embroker, Inc.
description: Developer of a digital insurance policy management platform designed to make insurance work better for businesses of all types and sizes. The company's platform offers custom-built insurance policies that are underwritten instantly with real-time claims tracking, enabling businesses to find the right insurance policies as per their requirements.
one_liner: Developer of a digital insurance policy management platform designed to make insurance work better for businesses of all types and sizes. The company's platform offers custom-built insurance policies that are underwritten instantly with real-time claims tracking, enabling businesses to find the right insurance policies as per their requirements.
